Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/hardware

What you'll find here: hardware configuration utilities for your system

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

CDspindown-1.0b.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-05-22
utility to set interval for IDE CDROM spin downs (3750 bytes)
SiS471_bus.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-06-29
set ISA bus speed on SiS 85c471 486 chipset (3424 bytes)
adidrv.taz 1993-06-06
Configures some local bus IDE cards (4685 bytes)
cachectl-1.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-12-15
allows you to control level 1 cache (3353 bytes)
cyrix-1.00-elf.patch (LSM entry) 1996-09-01
patch for Cyrix cache enabler (1448 bytes)
cyrix-1.00.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-02-15
activate/tune 1kB cache on Cyrix chips (29191 bytes)
dram-1.00.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1994-09-02
changes your dram refresh rate for speedup (14172 bytes)
f6x86-1.0.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-08-28
xforms based tool for configuring Cyrix/IBM 6x86 CPU (21081 bytes)
gatoff.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-07-17
turns off guaranteed access timing for PCI (871 bytes)
hdparm-3.5.tar.gz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1998-11-06
utility to tune Linux hard disk and (E)IDE parameters (15701 bytes)
hwclock-2.7.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-05-03
Read and set the Hardware Clock (65286 bytes)
isapnptools-1.18.bin.tgz (LSM entry) 1999-02-15
ISA plug and play configuration utilities (228020 bytes)
isapnptools-1.18.tgz (LSM entry) 1999-02-15
ISA plug and play configuration utilities (89511 bytes)
lcdpanel-0.50.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-07-30
driver code to drive LCD panels from the parallel port (7276 bytes)
memtest86-1.4a.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-06-17
memory tester for x86 systems (27403 bytes)
pnpkitv210.tgz (LSM entry) 1999-04-28
Resolve your Plug-And-Pray gripes and problems (296500 bytes)
ps2mouse-emul.c 1992-10-21
A program that interprets PS/2 mouse signals to X11 (5365 bytes)
pwrm-1.0.tar.Z (IAFA) 1993-01-29
power management for WD chipset based lap-tops (13194 bytes)
rdev.c 1992-12-01
set boot device,ramdisk size,vidmode w/out recompiling (11199 bytes)
scanport.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-09-25
scans ISA io space for hardware devices (23540 bytes)
scsi-idle-2.0.34.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-06-18
spin down SCSI disk after idle period. (14340 bytes)
scsifmt.c (LSM entry) 1997-02-08
send format and other low-level SCSI commands to a device (5785 bytes)
scsistop-0.3.3.c (LSM entry) 1998-10-15
a low-level SCSI drive start/stop program (5714 bytes)
set6x86-1.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-09-29
sets 5x86 and 6x86 config registers (52838 bytes)
shastakit.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-06-06
support for the shasta chipset (17597 bytes)
tosh_fan-1.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-08-07
a simple utility that can be run in the background to control the fan of a Toshiba laptop (14036 bytes)
update-1.3-spindown-patch.gz (LSM entry) 1998-06-08
enables HDs to effectively spin down by delaying the flushing (4431 bytes)
